publication.title: Mutationtaster2: Mutation prediction for the deep-sequencing age

summary.description: Employs a Bayes classifier to eventually predict the disease potential of an alteration. The Bayes classifier is fed with the outcome of all tests and the features of the alterations and calculates probabilities for the alteration to be either a disease mutation or a harmless polymorphism.
summary.name: MutationTaster
